short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Randomly display ancient Chinese poetry in the new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: After installing this extension, you will see an ancient Chinese poem randomly displayed in the new TAB. Without any other operation, you can create a new page at the top of the page to see the Chinese ancient poetry content randomly displayed by the application.
